fullDescription.intro: Returns the event logs registered by Moodle. The node receives as input the ids of the courses for which the event logs are to be obtained. The output table returns all logs, identifying the course id, the log date, the log identifier and other values such as the id of the user, item or module affected by the event.

ports.inPort: Input table containing a list of valid Courses (output from Moodle Courses node)
